label.value: Ask only those in the black list

item.tooltip: Otherwise, everyone who isn't present in the contact list will be asked with the challenge.

If the above option is active, only entry IDs that match these regular expressions will be asked with the challenge. Example regexps:
.*@jabber.org
.*@jabber.(org|ru)(/QIP)?
Entry IDs matching these regular expressions won't be asked with the challenge. See the blacklist regexps option for examples.
